TopicTitle: Just joined the forums but have played KSP for awhile

Articles.Content: Just wanted to stop by and say hi to everyone! I've been playing KSP for some time now and am really excited that missions look to be coming soon. To date my best accomplishment is landing safely on Eve; still working on the return trip, may have to be a rescue mission.

Welcome to the forum! I must say landing on Eve is a great achievement! Getting back is an even bigger one!! Good luck in your adventures!!

Laugh a little it makes the 'splosions more awesome!
